bwwExcerpt: If you’ve seen Jersey Boys or Beautiful, you might walk into A Beautiful Noise expecting a similarly satisfying blend of drama and musical revelation. And while this production brings energy, spectacle, and a powerhouse cast, it doesn’t quite strike the same emotional chord
